summary: Diff adds production configuration and smoke-test documentation, plus backend/frontend code changes, but does not provide evidence of an actual production deployment or completed post-deploy smoke test, and introduces UI/content elements that were not requested for a deployment-only task.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy Version 33 to production on the Internet Computer, upgrading both backend and frontend asset canisters using the existing single-actor backend architecture.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows documentation additions and code changes, but no evidence of production deployment actions/config (e.g., canister IDs, dfx deploy commands, CI/CD, release scripts) or that the frontend asset canister/backend canister were actually upgraded in production.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend canister is upgraded successfully without breaking existing stable data.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo changes are shown, but the diff summary does not provide evidence of stable variable usage/migrations or explicit compatibility handling to ensure stable data is preserved across upgrade.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend loads successfully in production and routes render (/, and all /offers/* pages).
missing_requirements.reason: There is no evidence in the diff summary of a production deployment validation (only a checklist/doc). Code-splitting is mentioned, but not proof of production routing working.

missing_requirements.requirement: Run a production smoke test after deployment covering landing page render, offer navigation, contact form submission path (incl. reCAPTCHA readiness handling), and admin-only query access control.
missing_requirements.reason: A smoke test checklist document was added, but the diff does not provide evidence that the smoke test was actually executed in production or that results were captured.

missing_requirements.requirement: A short deployment note exists stating whether reCAPTCHA is configured in production and, if not, the exact admin action required to configure it using the existing backend method.
missing_requirements.reason: Documentation describes how to configure reCAPTCHA and post-deploy steps, but the diff summary does not show an explicit statement of the current production configuration status (configured vs not configured) as required by the acceptance criteria. The deployment notes file is truncated and its content is not evidenced beyond a header.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/maintained a country calling codes dataset implying a country code dropdown selector for the contact form, despite the contact form being described as having no phone fields and no such feature being requested for deployment.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is deployment-only with a non-goal of adding new product features; a country code dropdown/calling code content is not needed to deploy Version 33 and appears unrelated to the stated contact form fields (name/email/message only).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes additional social/CTA elements and a custom attribution text with profanity.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include not changing UI/UX beyond what is necessary to deploy; adding/changing footer links/attribution text is a UI/content change not requested as part of deployment requirements.
